column4: Can anyone help me to setup LAN internet connection with static IP?
make sure your router and modem are working
so you want to talk to the gateway?
and it is on the sam switch/hub ?
if so, what is the IP of the gateway
i assume this is a wired connection
i didnt tell you to do that
if your ip is set correctly and the gateway is really in that range, then you should be able to ping it
this assumes the 172.19.42.2 and 172.19.42.1 interfaces are on the same switch
